name: posthog
description: PostHog is an open-source product analytics suite with heatmaps, session recording, event tracking, and feature flags. It's self-hostable or cloud-based, offering privacy-friendly data ownership for growth teams.
features: Event Tracking: Capture user interactions with flexible event instrumentation supporting both autocapture and manual tracking to analyze behavior patterns across your application.
Session Replay: Record and replay user sessions to understand navigation flows, identify friction points, and debug issues with full context of user interactions.
A/B Testing: Run controlled experiments with multivariate testing capabilities to validate hypotheses and optimize features based on statistical significance.
Feature Flags: Deploy features progressively with dynamic flag management, enabling gradual rollouts, targeted releases, and instant rollbacks without code changes.
Funnel Analysis: Visualize conversion paths and identify drop-off points across multi-step user journeys to optimize critical flows and improve completion rates.
Cohort Analysis: Segment users into behavioral cohorts and track retention, engagement, and conversion metrics over time to understand long-term product impact.
Custom Dashboards: Build tailored visualizations with drag-and-drop widgets, SQL queries, and real-time data updates to monitor KPIs relevant to your team.
API Integrations: Connect with third-party tools via REST APIs, webhooks, and native integrations to centralize data and automate workflows across your stack.
User Profiles: Build unified customer profiles by aggregating events, properties, and behavioral data to enable personalized experiences and targeted campaigns.
Privacy Controls: Ensure GDPR and CCPA compliance with built-in consent management, data anonymization, and configurable retention policies for user data.
